title: Anticoagulant Management: Activity-Based Mobile Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A one-week intensive course optimized for smartphone-based microlearning environments. Activity-based learning design centered on formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can explain drug interactions and monitoring indicators for anticoagulant therapy patients with 80% accuracy through case analysis.
Learners can propose at least three improvements to anticoagulant therapy protocols via team-based projects.
Learners can identify five or more daily-life challenges for anticoagulant users and implement empathetic communication strategies through patient role simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
